events.message: We have received the application for the software engineer role from the candidate, including their resume and cover letter.
The application has been categorised under the engineering cluster based on keywords found in the candidate's profile and experience.
A recruiter experienced in engineering recruitment has been assigned to manage the candidate's application and coordinate the next steps.
Completed the initial screening call with the candidate to assess their technical skills and cultural fit for the software engineer position.
Candidate responded promptly with additional information regarding their experience with DevOps tools and software development lifecycle.
Scheduled the technical interview with the engineering panel for next week to evaluate coding skills and problem-solving abilities.
The technical interview was successfully completed with positive feedback on the candidateâ€™s software engineering expertise and approach.
Arrange an HR interview to discuss benefits, company culture, and address any remaining questions from the candidate.
Completed the HR interview with the candidate, who expressed strong interest in joining our engineering team and aligning with company values.
Extended a competitive offer to the candidate for the software engineer position including salary, benefits, and start date.
Received positive feedback from the candidate who is enthusiastic about the offer and the opportunity to work with the engineering team.
The candidate formally accepted the job offer and confirmed their start date to begin contributing to software development projects.
Initiated onboarding process including system access setup, introduction to the engineering team, and orientation sessions.
Successfully closed the hire with the candidate now fully integrated and actively contributing to engineering projects.
